long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ‘Astrea Share Salesforce Records’ a user can share custom object records as well as well as Standard object records like Account, Contact, Lead etc. The app allows sharing a record with groups also.

Key Feature -
* Logged in user can share records of Custom objects with User/Group
* Logged in user can share records of Standard objects with User/Group

For any queries, please contact us at http://astreait.com/contact-us/
